[[Solar TV]] (2009-2011)| former_callsigns = | transmitter_power = 5 kilowatts| homepage = [http://www.etc.com.ph/ www.etc.com.ph]| }} '''DYKB-TV''', channel 8, is a television station of [[Radio Philippines Network]]. Its studios are located at Purok KBS, Pta.
